BLOCK.QRY: UPDATE ACTBUD_DEPT_HEAD_CON_TRNS T SET STR_BUDGET_YEAR=?,STR_DIVISION_CODE=?,STR_SUB_DIVION_CODE=?,STR_BUD_TYPE_CODE=?,STR_SCHEME_CODE=?,STR_PROJECT_CODE=?,STR_MAJOR_HEAD_CODE=?,STR_SUB_MAJOR_HEAD_CODE=?,STR_MINOR_HEAD_CODE=?,STR_SUB_MINOR_HEAD_CODE=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?,STR_GRANT_TYPE_CODE=? WHERE T.NUM_SRNO=? AND T.NUM_DEPT_CODE=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE ACTBUD_DEPT_HEAD_CON_TRNS T SET STR_BUDGET_YEAR=?,STR_DIVISION_CODE=?,STR_SUB_DIVION_CODE=?,STR_BUD_TYPE_CODE=?,STR_MAJOR_HEAD_CODE=?,STR_SUB_MAJOR_HEAD_CODE=?,STR_MINOR_HEAD_CODE=?,STR_SUB_MINOR_HEAD_CODE=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?,STR_GRANT_TYPE_CODE=? WHERE T.NUM_SRNO=? AND T.NUM_DEPT_CODE=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE ACTBUD_DEPT_HEAD_CON_TRNS T SET T.GNUM_ISVALID=0,T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.NUM_SRNO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
